queries.selectCameraCount: SELECT cam.*, COUNT(sbjagg.*) as count FROM cameras AS cam LEFT JOIN (SELECT sbj.camera, sbj.location, sbj.date, sbj.season, sbj.time_period, agg.data_choice, agg.subject_id FROM subjects AS sbj INNER JOIN aggregations AS agg ON sbj.subject_id = agg.subject_id) AS sbjagg ON cam.id = sbjagg.camera GROUP BY cam.cartodb_id ORDER BY count DESC
